title: Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security System Tool Activity
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of aurora focus powershell trace, api sensor, wmi and com based events.

definition.content:
[Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security](https://docs.arcticwolf.com/bundle/AES-Overview/page/What-is-Aurora-Endpoint-Security.html) is a unified solution that helpsÂ  to tackle modern threats. It provides comprehensive capabilities to detect and protect against threats across endpoints.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of aurora focus powershell trace, api sensor, wmi and com based events.

For more information, see the [Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/arctic_wolf_aurora_platform/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Captures PowerShell activity on devices, including the detection rule triggered, device details, instigating process information, PowerShell payload, script block content, and event severity. Provides context on executed scripts, along with timestamps and zone information, helping track potentially malicious or suspicious PowerShell activity, understand which process initiated it.

definition.title: Powershell trace based detection events over time
Top powershell trace based detection rules
Powershell trace based detection event details

definition.content: Tracks COM object activity on devices, capturing the detection rule triggered, device details, instigating process information, COM interface and program involved, event timestamps, and severity. Provides visibility into which processes interacted with COM objects, their context, and ownership, helping investigate suspicious or malicious COM activity.

definition.title: COM object visibility detection events over time
Top COM object visibility detection rules
COM object visibility detection event details

definition.content: Captures WMI activity on devices, including the detection rule triggered, device details, instigating process information, WMI commands executed, operations performed, and event severity. Provides context on consumer text, operation types, and their lengths, along with timestamps and zone information, helping track potentially malicious or suspicious WMI activity, identify which process initiated it.

Captures API sensor activity on devices, detailing the detection rule triggered, device information, instigating process attributes, API DLL involved, function called, and parameters used. Includes event timestamps, severity, and zone data, providing visibility into potentially malicious or suspicious API calls, helping identify which process initiated the activity.

definition.title: API sensor based detection events over time
Top API sensor based detection rules
API Sensor based detection event details

definition.content: Gives a focused view of incoming Powershell Trace, WMI, API Sensor and COM logs, showing event statuses over time and highlighting critical entries to help with quick review and investigation of important security events.

search.query: source:arctic-wolf-aurora-endpoint-security service:detection-events @event_type:(OpticsCaePowershellTraceEvent OR OpticsCaeWmiEvent OR OpticsCaeApiEvent OR OpticsCaeComEvent) $severity $event_name $event_type $device_name $com_interface $api_function

query.query_string: source:arctic-wolf-aurora-endpoint-security service:detection-events @event_type:(OpticsCaePowershellTraceEvent OR OpticsCaeWmiEvent OR OpticsCaeApiEvent OR OpticsCaeComEvent) @status:critical $severity $event_name $event_type $device_name $com_interface $api_function
